markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Enduring Debilitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1165) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 76</row>

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Debilitating Strike](/Classes.aspx?ID=10)

**Trigger**
You apply a debilitation to a creature.

</column>

---

You can make your debilitation last an exceptionally long time. The triggering debilitation lasts for 1 minute instead of until the end of your next turn.

<title level="2">Paragons of Promise</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 75</row>

The citizens of Promise represent some of the most capable experts, greatest minds, and powerful warriors on Golarion—ideal teachers and trainers for PCs who want to maximize their own potential. If the PCs secure Visitor’s Pins or an alliance with Mengkare, their access to Promise’s trainers and records unlock all of the following uncommon class feats.

**Related Feats**: [Apex Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1160), [Aura of Unbreakable Virtue](/Feats.aspx?ID=1161), [Bloodline Metamorphosis](/Feats.aspx?ID=1162), [Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1163), [Emblazon Divinity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1164), [Golden Body](/Feats.aspx?ID=1166), [Song of the Fallen](/Feats.aspx?ID=1168), [Spell Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=1843), [Superior Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=1170), [Ultimate Flexibility](/Feats.aspx?ID=1732), [Unstoppable Juggernaut](/Feats.aspx?ID=1631)
name: Enduring Debilitation
